extracted_playbook.title: Exchange Project Data Securely
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that project data is exchanged only via secure exchange services to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Project Storage
extracted_playbook.description: Use appropriate means to protect the project storage from unauthorized manipulation.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Opening Unknown Project Data
extracted_playbook.description: Do not open project data from an unknown source to avoid potential security risks.

extracted_playbook.title: Reduce User Rights
extracted_playbook.description: Reduce the user rights of the host application to the necessary minimum to limit potential exploitation.

cve_id: Mitigation for SRP700, Asset Health Monitoring and related products
